name: Sticked: A Doodle Quest
description:
In Sticked you follow the story of Craft, a friendly doodle who stumbles upon a great quest to save the land he loves, trying to rid it from the corruption that is spreading from the terrible 3rd dimension.

The land of Eldood used to be a nice and peaceful place, filled with friendly doodles and curious towns, everything was nice and simple, no extra shapes or three dimensional mumbo jumbo. But one day, strange things started to happen... Doodles went missing, mines started to fill with sketchy creatures, strange shiny objects appeared all around the world and the simple doodle people suddenly seemed more... detailed. The doodley lands that once seemed simple and colorless, suddenly started to look more detailed, a bit more filled with colors here and there, but also more dangerous.
